attributes.action: Ban or reduce the brightness of vehicle LED lights
attributes.additional_details: I would like DVLA to recognise that the new headlight technology, especially LEDs, are far too bright for the human eye and it hurts our eyes being on the receiving end of these lights. This is dangerous being dazzled constantly when driving
attributes.background: The new vehicle headlights especially LEDs are too bright. There needs to be a legal limit on luminosity.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban LED headlights
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701233
